announcements.announcement_1: Welcome! Noyaku has been updated. Please Update the App. Do Review Us on Playstore.
announcements.announcement_2: By Default, Text Mode has been enabled. If you want to translate Manga, you need to change to Image Mode by clicking on Book Icon.
announcements.announcement_3: If you are using Default Model in API Settings, change to Cheeky Tutor in Available Model for Faster Image Translation.
